devdoc.author: Horizon DAO (Yuri Fernandes)
devdoc.details: Aggregator registration conventions:		- For stablecoins 1:1 with USD, register base/USD tokens as base/stablecoin priceAggregator		- For ETH use zero address

SetAggregator(address,address,address,ad.details: Emitted when a new price aggregator is set

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAggregator(address,address,address).details: Set a new chainlink price aggregator

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Price Oracle

userdoc.notice: Uses Chainlink Price Aggregators to retrieve base price in quote (base/quote)
